description.value:
A large yellow gem, gleaming like fresh honey. One of the hardest nonmagical substances in the world.

This is used as the material component for the @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.Qj9baV1UtPqdd4P8]{Resurrection} spell, though it costs more than most diamonds which would be eligible for the spell. Resurrection cannot be cast which cannot be cast unless this component is carried by the caster. Alternatively, it might be part of the material component of a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.rmliJsYc0Loo3Jgt]{Raise Dead} or @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.bjDebvXFbxqEYkw6]{True Resurrection} spell.

This component is consumed by casting the Resurrection spell.

This diamond can be crushed into diamond dust over 1 hour using smith's or tinker's tools. You get the equivalent of 2 bags of diamond dust, valued at 200 gold.
